name: DiGiMD's Melkor Mancin Maker
description: Model created in the style of Melkor Mancin.

modelVersions.name: Melkor v1
modelVersions.description:
Initial release -- and only planned release. Have fun! I typoed the trigger phrase as melkor_manchin art style, but noticed way too late to go back. Model tested with anything v3 vae. Buy me a coffee if you're feeling generous!

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/DiGiMD
